title: Simulador De Orações Do Genshin Impact
disclaimer: Todos os ativos utilizados neste site são de propriedade da Mihoyo.
fanmade: Esta é uma aplicação feita por um fã, aproveite-a !
pressToContinue: Pressione em qualquer espaço vazio para continuar
installInstruction: Instruções para instalar a versão Desktop

wish.loadFailed:
Failed to load Banner!
Please switch to other banner or reconnect to the internet to avoid errors!

banner.wishDescription: A cada 10 Orações, é garantida a inclusão de pelo menos um item de 4 estrelas ou superior.
banner.beginnerSet: Desconto de 20% para o conjunto de 10. Garantido a obtenção da Noelle
banner.beginnerNote: Eu sei exatamente como me comportar como uma empregada.
banner.standardNote: Os desejos padrões não têm limite de tempo.
banner.eventNote: Os personagens ilimitados de 5 estrelas só podem ser obtidos na oração correspondente.

epitomizedPath.cancelDesc: Cancelar irá resetar seus Pontos do Destino acumulados
description: "Epitomized Path" é uma mecânica incluída nesta "Epitome Invocation". Travelers can chart a course towards a specific 5-Star promotional weapon they hope to obtain.
Once you have charted a course towards your chosen weapon, you will obtain 1 Fate Point upon receiving a 5-Star weapon that is not the one that you chose. You can obtain a maximum of 2 Fate Points.
Once you've reached the maximum amount of Fate Points, the next 5-Star weapon you choose will be the one you have chosen through "Epitomized Path".
When you obtain the chosen weapon in Epitome Invocation through Epitomized Path, the accumulated Fate Points will be cleared .
If you do not use Epitomized Path to obtain a weapon, you will not accumulate Fate Points.
The charted course towards a certain weapon can be changed or cancelled. However, after doing so, any current Fate Points will be cleared.
At the end of the current period of Epitome Invocation, any current Fate Points will be cleared.

result.meteorFailed: Falha ao carregar animação de cometa
result.title: Resultado da oração para {item} et al

outfit.heading: Estilos de Personagem
outfit.purchasePrompt: Você ainda não possui o personagem que pode usar esta vestimenta, você têm certeza que deseja comprá-la?
outfit.promptInfo: Você ainda poderá usá-la quando conseguir o personagem.

sea-breeze-dandelion.name: Sea Breeze Dandelion
sea-breeze-dandelion.description: Jean's summer wear. Light and cool, but no less elegant for it. The perfect choice for a trip to the seaside.

summertime-sparkle.name: Summertime Sparkle
summertime-sparkle.description: Barbara's beach attire. This pretty skirt brims with summer vitality and carries with it a cool ocean breeze.

opulent-splendor.name: Opulent Splendor
opulent-splendor.description: Keqing's formal wear. Amidst the beautiful dawn of the Lantern Rite, the threads weaved by days of hard work intertwine into a light yet magnificent appearance.

orchid_s-evening-gown.name: Orchid's Evening Gown
orchid_s-evening-gown.description: Ningguang's formal wear. The long cyan skirt traces her elegant curves, and the butterfly wings at her ankles lend the outfit a touch of light grace.

ein-immernachtstraum.name: Ein Immernachtstraum
ein-immernachtstraum.description: A ceremonial outfit for the Prinzessin. May she who is noble retain her courage, sincerity, and kindness forever, such that no evil shall ever overcome her.

red-dead-of-night.name: Red Dead of Night
red-dead-of-night.description: One of the outfits Diluc wears during covert actions, it resembles a flame dancing in the shadows. The crimson red traces it leaves behind at the edges of the enemy's vision will scar their nightmares forever.

a-sobriquet-under-shade.name: A Sobriquet Under Shade
a-sobriquet-under-shade.description: An outfit Lisa had someone commission for her when she revisited Sumeru. A perfect balance between practicality and elegance, the dress bears a resemblance to Lisa’s old uniform from the Akademiya days.

springbloom-missive.name: Springbloom Missive
springbloom-missive.description: Ayaka’s travel outfit. Its design is based on the Fontaine dresses depicted in light novel illustrations and seems to reflect the lifestyle of proper ladies who live in that nation.

details.percentageDrop: Porcentagem de drop de itens {rarity} estrelas: {percentage}
details.probInfo: Probabilidade de Drop e Itens de {rarity} Estrelas: {singlePercentage} (Incl. garantia: {avgPercentage})
details.beginnerInfo: Sem limite de tempo (Termina após 20 orações)
details.alert: ※ This is a {wishName}. The wish guarantee count is accumulated within this event only and is independent of the guarantee counts of other wishes.
beginner:
Beginners' Wish has no time limit and is aimed at Travelers who have recently landed in Teyvat. Non-promotional characters and weapons are available.
In Beginners' Wish, 10-wish sets cost 20% less Acquaint Fate, and your first 10-wish set is guaranteed to include {character} , and your second 10-wish set is guaranteed to include one other min. 4-Star character!
Beginners' Wish expires after 20 attempts. After the wish expires, the page will disappear.
※In most cases, the base probability of all characters and weapons is evenly distributed. If there is a boost or guarantee in effect, please refer to the corresponding rules.

Base probability of winning 5-Star character = 0.600%
Base probability of winning 4-Star character = 5.100%; consolidated probability (incl. guarantee) = 13.000%;
standard:
"{bannerName}" é uma oração comum sem limite de tempo, onde personagens e armas não limitadas estão disponíveis.
Nesta Oração, a cada conjunto de 10 orações, é garantido que inclua pelo menos um item de 4 estrelas ou superior.
※Em circunstâncias normais, todos os personagens ou armas são aplicáveis às probabilidades básicas. Em casos de probabilidades aumentadas, consulte as regras das garantias.

A probabilidade base de obter um item de 5 estrelas é de 0.600%, a probabilidade base de obtenção de um personagem 5 estrelas é de 0.300%, a probilidade base de obtenção de um personagem 5 estrelas é de 0.300%; e a probabilidade conjunta de obter um item de 5 estrelas é de 1.600%. É garantido um item de 5 estrelas pelo menos uma vez a cada 90 tentativas.
A probabilidade base de obter um item de 4 estrelas é de 5.100%, a probabilidade base de obtenção de uma arma 4 estrelas é de 2.550%, a probabilidade base de obtenção de uma arma de 4 estrelas é de 2.550% e a probabilidade conjunta de obter um item de 4 estrelas (incl. garantia) é de 13.000%. É gatantido um item de 4 estrelas pelo menos uma vez a cada 10 tentativas, em que a probabilidade de obtenção de um item de 4 estrelas é de 99.400%, e a probabilidade de de um item de 5 estrelas é de 0.600%.
events:
Event Wish "{bannerName}" is now available. During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {featuredCharacter} as well as 4-star characters {rateupCharacters} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."
※ In most cases, drifting base probability of all characters and weapons is evenly distributed. If driftingre is a boost or guarantee in effect, please refer to drifting corresponding rules.

For Event Wish "{bannerName}": Base probability of winning 5-star character = 0.600% ; consolidated probability (incl. guarantee) = 1.600%; guaranteed to win 5-star character at least once per 90 attempts.
The first time you win a 5-star item in this event wish, there is a 50.000% chance it will be the promotional character {featuredCharacter}. If the first 5-star character you win in this event wish is not the promotional character, then the next 5-star character you win is guaranteed to be the promotional character.

For Event Wish "{bannerName}": Base probability of winning 4-star item = 5.100%; base probability of winning 4-star character = 2.550%, and base probability of winning 4-star weapon = 2.550%; consolidated probability (incl. guarantee) of winning 4-star item = 13.000%; guaranteed to win 4-star or above item at least once per 10 attempts; probability of winning 4-star item through the guarantee = 99.400%, and probability of winning 5-star item through the guarantee = 0.600%.
The first time you win a 4-star item in this event wish, there is a 50.000% chance it will be one of the featured characters {rateupCharacters}. If the first 4-star item you win in this event wish is not one of the featured characters, then the next 4-star item you win is guaranteed to be a featured character. When you win a featured 4-star item, the probability of obtaining each featured 4-star character is equal between all of them.
weapons:
Event Wish "{bannerName}" is now available. During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon {featuredWeapon1} and the 5-star weapon {featuredWeapon2} as well as the event-exclusive 4-star weapon {rateupWeapons} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
※ Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."
※ In most cases, the base probability of all characters and weapons is evenly distributed. If there is a boost or guarantee in effect, please refer to the corresponding rules.

For Event Wish "{bannerName}": Base probability of winning 5-star weapon = 0.700%; consolidated probability (incl. guarantee) = 1.850%; guaranteed to win 5-star weapon at least once per 80 attempts.
The first time you win a 5-star weapon in this event wish, there is a 75.000% chance it will be one of the promotional weapons {featuredWeapon1} and {featuredWeapon2}. If the first 5-star weapon you win in this event wish is not one of the promotional weapons, then the next 5-star weapon you win is guaranteed to be a promotional weapon. In the event that you obtain a promotional 5-star item through a wish without having maximum Fate Points, the probability of obtaining each promotional 5-star weapon is equal between all of them.
For Event Wish "{bannerName}", you can chart a course towards your chosen promotional 5-star weapon with "Epitomized Path." The choice of weapon will only be valid for this period of Event Wish "{bannerName}".
For Event Wish "{bannerName}", after charting a course towards a chosen weapon with "Epitomized Path," if you obtain a 5-star weapon that was not your chosen weapon, you will receive 1 Fate Point. Once you have reached the maximum amount of Fate Points, the next 5-star weapon will be guaranteed to be your chosen weapon. Once you have obtained the chosen weapon, the number of Fate Points will reset to 0 whether or not you have reached maximum points, and you will have to accumulate them again. If you do not use the "Epitomized Path" to chart a course towards a chosen weapon, you will not receive Fate Points.
After charting a course towards a chosen weapon, you can change your choice or cancel it altogether, but doing so will reset the Fate Points to 0 and you will have to accumulate them again.
※ The Fate Points for this Wish are only valid for the current period of Event Wish "Epitome Invocation". Once the Wish event is over, the number of Fate Points will reset to 0, and you will have to accumulate them again

For Event Wish "{bannerName}": Base probability of winning 4-star item = 6.000%; base probability of winning 4-star character = 3.000%, and base probability of winning 4-star weapon = 3.000%; consolidated probability (incl. guarantee) of winning 4-star item = 14.500%; guaranteed to win 4-star or above item at least once per 10 attempts; probability of winning 4-star item through the guarantee = 99.300%, and probability of winning 5-star item through the guarantee = 0.700%.
The first time you win a 4-star item in this event wish, there is a 75.000% chance it will be one of the featured weapons {rateupWeapons}. If the first 4-star item you win in this event wish is not one of the featured weapons, then the next 4-star item you win is guaranteed to be a featured weapon. When you win a featured 4-star item, the probability of obtaining each featured 4-star weapon is equal between all of them.

convertion.fiveStar: As armas de 5 estrelas obtidas nesta oração vêm com {starglitter} ×10;
convertion.fourStar: As armas de 4 estrelas obtidas nesta oração vêm com {starglitter} ×2;
convertion.threeStar: As armas de 3 estrelas obtidas nesta oração vêm com {stardust} ×15.

duplicate.heading: 〓Personagens Duplicados〓
duplicate.text: Ao obter um personagem {rarity} estrelas que você já possui (mesmo quando obtido em oração, resgatado na loja ou no jogo): Na 2ª - 7ª vez que obter o personagem, ele será convertido na {stellaFortuna} ×1 do personagem e {starglitter} {constBonus}; a partir da 8ª aquisição, ele será convertido em {starglitter} {fullConstBonus}.

history.title: Histórico de Orações
history.resetPrompt:
Esta ação também vai remover todos os Personagens e Armas relacionadas ao "{bannerName}" Banner do Inventário.
Você tem certeza de que deseja resetar ?
history.disclaimer: Nós nunca salvamos dados na nuvem. Todos os dados são guardados em IndexedDB, ou seja, no armazenamento do seu navegador. Os dados não serão deletados a menos que você delete manualmente, além de usar o botão 'Limpar' ou limpar os dados de navegação.

shop.noLimitTime: Itens disponíveis sem limite de tempo

recomended.obtainTotal: Obtenha um total de {totalGenesis} Cristais Gênesis e {totalPrimo} Gemas Essenciais ao longo de 30 dias
recomended.claimingBlessing: Clique para resgatar suas recompensas diárias da Benção da Lua Nova.
recomended.collect: Colete recompensas por login diário durante 30 dias.

description.intertwined: Uma pedra do destino que conecta sonhos. O seu brilho pode entrelaçar e conectar sonhos, assim como seu brilho pode conectar as estrelas em formatos de desejos de um coração.
description.acquaint: Uma semente que pode iluminar a noite. Não importa a distância, guiada pelo brilho da pedra, o sesejo do destino será encontrado sob as estrelas.

menu.showAllitems: Mostrar todos os itens no Invetário
menu.clearCache: Limpar memória em cachê ( {size} ) ? Você precisará baixar novamente os arquivos de cachê depois desta ação!
menu.resetPrompt: Você tem certeza que deseja limpar Todos os dados e restaurar o padrão ?
menu.resetDetail: Isto também vai resetar o histórico, cálculos de Pity, Balanço e todos os itens do inventário.
menu.removeKeyConfirm: Você tem certeza que deseja remover a Chave de Anúncios atual ? Você precisará cadastrar uma nova chave para remover anúncios no futuro!
menu.noKey: Não pusse uma Chave de Anúncios?
menu.verifyFail: Falha ao verificar a Chave de Anúncios, verifique sua conexão !
menu.invalidKey: Esta chave não é mais válida
menu.adFreeUser: Você está usando o Simulador sem anúncios agora!
menu.inputKeyTxt: Digite a Chave para Remover Anúncios !
menu.authorNotes: * Sentimos muito pelos anúncios. Não desejamos atrapalhar sua experiencia de oração, mas não temos patrocinadores para manter esse aplicativo online. Se você não deseja nos patrocinar com anúncios, você pode ativar seu AdBlocker or usar um DNS customizado: não o impediremos.
